00023 /// @file   BioTypes.cpp
00024 /// @brief  Functions to work on ChipStream BioTypes.

00039 /*
00040  * Convert the enumerant to a value used by the CHP files
00041  */
00042 int affx::GTypeCallToChpValue(affx::GType call)
00043 {
00044     switch (call)       
00045     {
00046         case NN: return ALLELE_NO_CALL; break;
00047         case AA: return ALLELE_A_CALL; break;
00048         case AB: return ALLELE_AB_CALL; break;
00049         case BB: return ALLELE_B_CALL; break;
00050         default: Err::errAbort("Don't recognize call of type: " + ToStr(call));
00051     }
00052     // not reached, but return something for gcc.
00053     Err::errAbort("GTypeCallToChpValue: Internal error.");
00054     return ALLELE_NO_CALL;
00055 }
00056 
00057 /// @brief     Convert a GType enum to an external integer value
00058 /// @param     gtype     The GType to convert
00059 /// @return    the value to use for output
00060 int
00061 affx::GType_to_int(GType gtype)
00062 {
00063   switch (gtype) 
00064     {
00065     case NN:
00066       return -1;
00067       break;
00068     case AA:
00069       return 0;
00070       break;
00071     case AB:
00072       return 1;
00073       break;
00074     case BB:
00075       return 2;
00076       break;
00077     default:
00078       Err::errAbort("Gtype_to_int: bad conversion");
00079       return 123; // prevent warning
00080       break;
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 /// @brief     Convert an integer from a file to an internal GType
00085 /// @param     gtype_int int to convert
00086 /// @return    GType enum
00087 GType
00088 affx::GType_from_int(int gtype_int)
00089 {
00090   switch (gtype_int) 
00091     {
00092     case -1:
00093       return NN;
00094       break;
00095     case 0:
00096       return AA;
00097       break;
00098     case 1:
00099       return AB;
00100       break;
00101     case 2:
00102       return BB;
00103       break;
00104     default:
00105       Err::errAbort("GType_from_int: bad conversion");
00106       return NN; // prevent warning
00107       break;
00108     }
00109 }
00110 
00111 /// @brief     Check that the gtype is AA,AB,BB,NN
00112 /// @param     gtype     
00113 /// @return    true if valid
00114 int
00115  affx::GType_valid(int gtype)
00116 {
00117   if ((gtype==AA)||(gtype==AB)||(gtype==BB)||(gtype==NN)) {
00118     return 1;
00119   }
00120   return 0;
00121 }
00122 
00123 /// @brief     Check that the gtype is AA,AB,BB  (not NN)
00124 /// @param     gtype     
00125 /// @return    true if called
00126 int
00127 affx::GType_called(int gtype)
00128 {
00129   if ((gtype==AA)||(gtype==AB)||(gtype==BB)) {
00130     return 1;
00131   }
00132   return 0;
00133 }

00137 /// @brief     convert the BioType Gender to a string
00138 /// @param     gender    an affx::Gender value
00139 /// @return    pointer to a const string
00140 const char*
00141 affx::getGenderString(affx::Gender gender)
00142 {
00143   // NOTE! Keep in sync with "enum Gender".
00144   const char* gender_string[]={"female", "male", "unknown"};
00145   //
00146   switch (gender) {
00147   case affx::Female:
00148     return gender_string[0];
00149   case affx::Male:
00150     return gender_string[1];
00151   case affx::UnknownGender:
00152     return gender_string[2];
00153   default:
00154     Err::errAbort("getGenderString: unhandled gender");
00155     // bogus return for gcc
00156     return NULL;
00157   }
00158 }
00159 
00160 /// @brief Change gender call Male <-> Female.  Unknown stays the same.  This
00161 /// is used for chrZW gender calling.
00162 /// @param     gender    an affx::Gender value
00163 /// @return    gender    an affx::Gender value
00164 affx::Gender affx::flipMaleFemaleGender (affx::Gender gender) {
00165     if (gender == affx::Male) {
00166         return affx::Female;
00167     }
00168     else if (gender == affx::Female) {
00169         return affx::Male;
00170     }
00171     else {
00172         return gender;
00173     }
00174 
00175 //     return static_cast<affx::Gender>(((-1 * gender) + 4) % 3);
00176 
00177 }
